Text:
that's an oversimplification.

People can be manipulated into supporting things that might even be against their own self interest by using ideas and symbolism like patriotism, nationalism, racial superiority, etc.

And they don't even have to know the real purpose, just whatever emotional trigger that gets them to support it.

but the people who supported GWB were actually a small percentage of the population, and they were fed lies.

Supporting something that is presented to you falsely isn't the same as wanting whatever is actually happening.

Not many people who now know the truth about our reasons for invading Iraq would support it if we had it to do over again.

Saw this on television when it first came out.  Enjoyed it then (if enjoy is the right word!) and look forward to seeing it again.

Thankyou Rosie.
Hhiiimmmm, Maybe he blew up/ Burnt down an "important" building and blamed it on terrorists ?

It doesn't really matter what lead them to accept it or allow it. 

The fact of the matter is that enough civilians knew about what was happening, that it should never have happened in a million years!!! 

Pathetic!!!


Thanks for the download rosie1966, now please seed everybody.
When the populace accepts what their "leaders" say, without asking question, this is what can happen. Iraq is another, less catastrophic example. Thanks, rosie!
